entry.title: LN-Symmetry Project Recap
entry.summary: The blog post discusses a practical implementation of instagibbs' Core Lightning (CLN) by force-closing a channel on the inquisition signet. The author has shared their successful experience and provided a method accessible via a [Gist](https://gist.github.com/chrisguida/43e482e684727daa618423e52a14d09a). They invite others to test out the process and share feedback on whether it works effectively or causes any issues. This could be an opportunity for programmers interested in cryptocurrency networks and Lightning Network protocols to experiment with channel management and contribute to the development of these technologies through real-world testing.
